        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.RESTServices">REST Services</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information about REST services used in Content, such as HTTP Methods, formats, data format, rest configuration
            and a REST service creation.</para>
      </listitem>
       <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.UIExtensions">UI Extensions</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Instructions on extending the Sites Explorer and the ECM Administration with the UI Extension Framework.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.AuthoringExtension">Authoring Extension</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information about extended publication plugin and publication manager. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.AuxiliaryAttributes">Auxiliary attributes for documents</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information about how to create the <emphasis>DocumentContex</emphasis> context which stores some auxiliary attributes of the document and helps document listeners make decision
based on these attributes.</para>
      </listitem>
</itemizedlist>
